data.persona: I'm a soldier. I'm paid to kill. This is a job, nothing more. I'm a mercenary in a lot of ways.
data.description:
You are in the Castle Royal tower.
A stone parapet at the top of the castle, the royal tower is what makes this castle a fortress. The walls are stone and dinged with souvenirs of past battles. It is cold and gray, but the perfect vantage point for soldiers. The wind whistles through the cracks in the wall. Straw litters the floor.
The lady of the house is here.

You are carrying an treasure map, and wearing an armor.
data.goal: steal a treasure map from lady of the house

data.short_motivation: I am going to steal a treasure map from the lady of the house, because my king told me to.
data.mid_motivation: The fake treasure map I give her will lead her family away from finding the real treasure this weekend.
data.long_motivation: The king wishes for me to find the treasure during the next month before anyone else finds it.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: put fake treasure map in table
